TopicTitle: Revert to Launch causes a presumed physics bug with specific Bluedog Design Bureau parts

Articles.Content:
Recently encountered a strange bug that freezes the game when produced.

First I partially assemble the craft per the BDB wiki and launch it, on a revert to launch the craft starts clipping with the nose heatshield and when switching to the aforementioned part the game freezes after a few seconds.

 

Modlist and output log here:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1P2wXAn9eixqan3vBgAyJqe1bhrhaRb-n/view?usp=sharing

Any help is appreciated
